title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Change label font size in the UI.
2. Observe that the label height remains the same, even though the font size has been modified.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label in the UI, the height of the label does not change immediately. The label height remains the same, regardless of the font size selected.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly when the font size is modified. This means that if a larger font size is selected, the label height should increase to accommodate the larger text.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the UI.
2. Select a label and modify its font size.
3. Observe that the label height does not change to match the new font size.
